name: Anthony D. Joseph
content: Anthony D. Joseph | EECS at UC Berkeley Anthony D. Joseph: Faculty Home Page Larger Photo Anthony D. Joseph Professor Contact Information 465 Soda Hall tel: 510-643-7212 fax: 510-643-7352 adj@cs.berkeley.edu Office Hours By appointment only - please email for appointment Links Personal Homepage Publications Dissertations Research Support Damon Hinson damonh@berkeley.edu Biography Professor Joseph is a Chancellor's Professor at UC Berkeley. His primary research interests are in Genomics, Secure Machine Learning, Datacenters, mobile/distributed computing, and wireless communications (networking and telephony). He is part of the RISE Lab.
